DOC.brief_title: Oncology Research Information Exchange Network ( ORIEN ) Lung Cancer Study

DOC.criteria: > = 18 year age Diagnosed metastatic ( stage 3b/4 ) nonsmall cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) The total combined sample size must include least 100 people receive one treatment PD1/PDL1 inhibitor treatment ( immunotherapy ) , 50 patient receive Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor ( EGFRTKI ) . Patients receive treatment track treatment outcome , well serve comparison participant data analysis outcomes associate PD1/PDL1 EGFRTKI ) .
